MCQ: What is generative artificial intelligence capable of generating?
Choices: a: Only text | b: Text, images, videos, or other data | c: Only images | d: Only videos

MCQ: Which model enabled an AI boom of generative AI systems in the early 2020s?
Choices: a: Markov chains | b: Transformer network | c: Variational autoencoder | d: Generative adversarial network

MCQ: What is an example of a generative AI system trained on programming language text?
Choices: a: Stable Diffusion | b: MusicGen | c: OpenAI Codex | d: DALL-E

MCQ: Which type of data can generative AI systems be trained on for protein structure prediction and drug discovery?
Choices: a: Text | b: Images | c: Molecules | d: Code

MCQ: What can be used to run generative AI models with tens of billions of parameters on laptop or desktop computers?
Choices: a: Arrays of GPUs | b: AI accelerator chips | c: Both a and b | d: Consumer-grade gaming graphics cards
